items.question: What is AIDORag?
items.answer: AIDORag is an AI-powered document intelligence platform that lets you upload documents, ask questions, and get instant answers with source citations.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: We support PDF, DOCX, TXT, Excel, PowerPoint, and many more document formats.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Yes, we use enterprise-grade encryption and never share your data with third parties.

items.question: Can I use AIDORag for free?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a free plan with limited features. You can upgrade anytime.

items.question: How accurate are the answers?
items.answer: Our RAG technology provides highly accurate answers by citing specific sources from your documents.

items.question: Do you offer team plans?
items.answer: Yes, our Pro and Business plans include team collaboration features.

items.question: Can I integrate with other tools?
items.answer: Yes, we offer API access and integrations with popular tools.

items.question: What support options are available?
items.answer: We offer email support for all plans, priority support for Pro, and dedicated support for Business.

story.title: Our Story
paragraphs: AIDORag was founded in 2024 with a simple vision: make document intelligence accessible to everyone.
We saw how organizations struggled to extract insights from their documents and knew AI could help.
Today, we serve thousands of users worldwide, from individual researchers to Fortune 500 companies.

items.userFirstDesc: We believe in the power of collaboration and teamwork, both within our organization and with partners and customers.
items.innovationDesc: We consistently adhere to the highest standards of ethics and integrity, taking responsibility for our actions and decisions.
items.transparencyDesc: Quality and excellence in products and services are our top priorities. Reliability reflects our commitment to consistent, high-quality results.
items.communityDesc: We always strive for excellence in everything we do, continually improving and innovating to exceed expectations.

members.name: Nico Nguyen
members.title: MBA – AI & Fin-Sec Consultant
members.quote: We don't build AI to impress. We build AI that works - AI that's practical, understandable, and fully owned by our clients. At AIDORag, real-world impact always comes before hype.

members.name: Martha Nguyen
members.title: Chemical Engineering
members.quote: Every solution at AIDO is crafted with care - not just as a product, but as a complete journey. We build living systems that adapt and grow with our clients, because true partnership means walking the path together.

members.name: Peter Vo
members.title: Bachelor of Linguistics
members.quote: At AIDORag, we don't just build tools - We design transformative learning experiences where people, technology, and strategic thinking evolve together. Our mission is to unlock human potential through sustainable digital innovation.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to Our Newsletter

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Mix Mode is our most advanced query mode, intelligently combining the strengths of all other modes to deliver the best possible results. It represents the culmination of our research into optimal document retrieval strategies.

section1.title: How Mix Mode Works
section1.content: Mix Mode analyzes your query and dynamically selects the optimal combination of Naive, Local, Global, and Hybrid modes based on the nature of your question. Our AI evaluates the query complexity, scope, and intent to determine the best approach for each specific question.

section2.title: Key Benefits
section2.content: Mix Mode delivers best-of-all-worlds accuracy by automatically selecting the right mode for each query. It optimizes for any query type, from simple keyword searches to complex relationship questions, resulting in faster average response times and more relevant results.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.content: Start using Mix Mode today and experience the difference in your document queries. It's our recommended default for most users who want the best results without having to think about which mode to use.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Knowledge graphs are at the heart of understanding relationships in your documents. Here's how AIDORag builds comprehensive knowledge graphs automatically, connecting information across all your documents.

section1.title: Entity Extraction
section1.content: Our AI identifies key entities including people, organizations, locations, concepts, and more from your documents using state-of-the-art NLP models. Each entity is categorized and linked to its source documents.

section2.title: Relationship Mapping
section2.content: Once entities are identified, we map the relationships between them, creating a rich network of connections. This allows you to discover insights that span multiple documents and understand how different concepts relate to each other.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.content: Knowledge graphs transform how you understand your documents, revealing hidden connections and insights. Explore your knowledge graph through our interactive visualization tool and discover connections you might have missed.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Learn how Thompson & Associates, a mid-sized law firm, transformed their contract review process using AIDORag. This case study demonstrates the real-world impact of AI-powered document intelligence.

section1.title: The Challenge
section1.content: The firm was spending an average of 4 hours per contract for due diligence review, creating bottlenecks in their workflow. With increasing client demands and document volumes, they needed a solution that could scale.

section2.title: The Solution
section2.content: By implementing AIDORag, the firm automated entity extraction, clause identification, and risk flagging. The system learned from their existing contracts and adapted to their specific legal terminology and requirements.

conclusion.title: Results
conclusion.content: The firm achieved an 80% reduction in review time, 95% accuracy in clause identification, and 50% cost savings on due diligence. AIDORag has become an essential tool for modern legal practice.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Document chunking is a critical step in the RAG pipeline. The way you split documents directly impacts search quality and response accuracy. Understanding chunking helps you get the most out of your RAG implementation.

section1.title: What is Chunking?
section1.content: Chunking is the process of splitting documents into smaller, meaningful segments that can be individually indexed and retrieved. The goal is to create chunks that are small enough to be relevant but large enough to contain meaningful context.

section2.title: Chunking Strategies
section2.content: There are several approaches: fixed-size chunks are simple but may break context; semantic chunks preserve meaning but are computationally intensive; our hybrid approach provides the best of both worlds and is our recommended default.

conclusion.title: Best Practices
conclusion.content: For optimal results, ensure your documents have clear structure, use consistent formatting, and let AIDORag's smart chunking do the rest. Trust our intelligent chunking algorithms for the best retrieval performance.

fullstack.description: We're looking for a Senior Full-Stack Engineer to help build and scale our document intelligence platform. You'll work on everything from our React frontend to our Node.js backend and PostgreSQL database.

responsibilities.item1: Design and implement new features across the full stack
responsibilities.item3: Write clean, maintainable, and well-tested code
responsibilities.item4: Collaborate with product and design teams
responsibilities.item5: Mentor junior developers and contribute to technical decisions

requirements.item1: 3-5 years of experience in full-stack development
requirements.item2: Proficiency in React, TypeScript, and Node.js
requirements.item3: Experience with PostgreSQL or similar databases
requirements.item4: Understanding of RESTful APIs and microservices

niceToHave.item2: Knowledge of vector databases and embeddings

ml.description: Join our AI/ML team to build cutting-edge document understanding systems. You'll work on RAG pipelines, knowledge graphs, and entity extraction using the latest NLP techniques.

responsibilities.item1: Develop and improve our RAG and knowledge graph systems
responsibilities.item2: Train and fine-tune NLP models for document understanding
responsibilities.item3: Design efficient embedding and retrieval systems
responsibilities.item4: Collaborate with engineering to productionize ML models
responsibilities.item5: Stay current with the latest research in NLP and LLMs

requirements.item1: 3-5 years of experience in machine learning
requirements.item2: Strong background in NLP and deep learning
requirements.item4: Familiarity with LLMs, embeddings, and vector search
requirements.item5: MS or PhD in Computer Science, ML, or related field

niceToHave.item2: Experience with RAG systems and knowledge graphs
niceToHave.item3: Experience with production ML systems at scale

designer.description: We're looking for a Product Designer to create intuitive, beautiful experiences for our document intelligence platform. You'll own the design process from research to final implementation.

responsibilities.item1: Lead design for new features from concept to launch
responsibilities.item2: Conduct user research and usability testing
responsibilities.item3: Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity designs
responsibilities.item4: Maintain and evolve our design system
responsibilities.item5: Collaborate closely with engineering and product teams

requirements.item3: Proficiency in Figma and prototyping tools

advocate.description: Join us as a Developer Advocate to help developers build amazing things with AIDORag. You'll create content, build demos, and engage with our developer community.

responsibilities.item1: Create technical content, tutorials, and documentation
responsibilities.item3: Speak at conferences and host webinars
responsibilities.item4: Engage with developers on social media and forums
responsibilities.item5: Gather feedback to improve our developer experience

requirements.item2: Excellent written and verbal communication skills
requirements.item5: Passion for teaching and helping developers

niceToHave.item1: Experience with RAG or AI/ML technologies
niceToHave.item3: YouTube or technical blog with following

bestPractices.item1: Start with Mix mode for general queries

knowledgeGraph.title: Knowledge Graph
knowledgeGraph.subtitle: Visualize and explore entity relationships
knowledgeGraph.overview: The Knowledge Graph automatically extracts entities and relationships from your documents, creating a visual map of your knowledge base.
knowledgeGraph.codeExample:
const graph = await fetch('/api/knowledge-graph');
const { nodes, edges } = await graph.json();

bestPractices.item1: Upload related documents together for better connections
bestPractices.item2: Use graph queries for complex relationship questions
bestPractices.item3: Export and analyze graphs for deeper insights

apiAuth.title: API Authentication
apiAuth.subtitle: Secure your API requests with authentication
apiAuth.overview: All API requests require authentication using an API key. Generate keys from your dashboard and include them in the Authorization header.

bestPractices.item1: Never expose API keys in client-side code
bestPractices.item2: Use environment variables for key storage

webhooks.title: Webhooks
webhooks.subtitle: Receive real-time notifications about events
webhooks.overview: Webhooks allow you to receive real-time notifications when events occur in your AIDORag account, such as document processing completion.

rateLimits.title: Rate Limits
rateLimits.subtitle: Understand API rate limiting and quotas
rateLimits.overview: API rate limits help ensure fair usage and system stability. Limits vary by plan and can be monitored in your dashboard.
rateLimits.codeExample:
// Rate limit headers in response
X-RateLimit-Limit: 100
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 95
X-RateLimit-Reset: 1642000000

bestPractices.item3: Monitor usage to avoid hitting limits

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
This Privacy Policy describes how AIDORag, Inc. ("AIDORag," "we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and shares personal information about individuals who use our website at www.aidorag.ai (the "Site") and the AIDORag platform and related services (collectively, the "Services"). This Policy applies to personal information processed by us, including on our Site and Services.

By using our Services, you agree to the practices described in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this policy, please do not use our Services.

summaryKeyPoints.title: Summary of Key Points
summaryKeyPoints.content: This summary provides key points from our Privacy Policy. You can find more details about each of these topics in the full policy below.
items: We collect personal information you provide directly to us, such as account and profile information.
We automatically collect certain technical information when you use our Services.
We process your data to provide, improve, and administer our Services, for security and fraud prevention, and to comply with law.
We share personal information only in specific situations and with specific third parties.
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies.
You have rights regarding your personal information, depending on your location.
We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

infoCollect.title: What Information Do We Collect?
infoCollect.content:
We collect personal information that you voluntarily provide to us when registering for our Services, expressing interest in obtaining information, or otherwise contacting us.

Personal Information Provided by You: The personal information we collect depends on the context of your interactions with us and the choices you make. This may include:
items: Contact information (name, email address, phone number)
Account credentials (username, password)
Billing information (payment card details, billing address)
Profile information (profile picture, preferences)
Communications (messages, feedback, support requests)
Documents and files you upload to our platform
Any other information you choose to provide

automaticData.title: Information Automatically Collected
automaticData.content: We automatically collect certain information when you visit, use, or navigate our Services. This information does not reveal your specific identity but may include:
items: Device and browser information (IP address, browser type, operating system)
Usage data (pages viewed, time spent, clicks, referring URLs)
Location data (country, city based on IP address)
Cookie and tracking technology data

howWeProcess.title: How Do We Process Your Information?
howWeProcess.content: We process your personal information for a variety of purposes, depending on how you interact with our Services:
items: To provide and maintain our Services, including document processing and AI-powered analysis
To create and manage your account and authenticate your identity
To process your payments and manage billing
To respond to your inquiries and provide customer support
To send administrative information, such as updates, security alerts, and support messages
To improve and develop our Services through analytics and research
To protect our Services, detect fraud, and ensure security
To comply with legal obligations and enforce our terms
To send marketing communications (with your consent where required)

whenWeShare.title: When and With Whom Do We Share Your Personal Information?
whenWeShare.content: We may share your personal information in the following situations:
items: Service Providers: We share data with third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf (hosting, payment processing, analytics, customer support)
Business Transfers: In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred
Legal Requirements: We may disclose information if required by law or in response to valid legal requests
Protection of Rights: To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property, and that of our users or others
With Your Consent: We may share your information with your explicit consent for other purposes

cookies.title: Do We Use Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies?
cookies.content:
Yes, we use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect and store information. Cookies are small data files placed on your device that help us improve your experience and our Services.

Types of cookies we use:
items: Essential Cookies: Required for basic functionality and security
Performance Cookies: Help us understand how visitors interact with our Services
Functional Cookies: Remember your preferences and settings
Targeting Cookies: May be used for marketing purposes

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.content: Most web browsers are set to accept cookies by default. You can usually modify your browser settings to remove or reject cookies. Please note that removing or rejecting cookies may affect the availability and functionality of our Services.

socialLogins.title: How Do We Handle Your Social Logins?
socialLogins.content:
We offer the ability to register and log in using your third-party social media accounts (such as Google). If you choose to do this, we will receive certain profile information from your social media provider.

The profile information we receive may vary but often includes your name, email address, profile picture, and other information you choose to make public. We will use the information we receive only for the purposes described in this Privacy Policy.

dataRetention.title: How Long Do We Keep Your Information?
dataRetention.content:
We will keep your personal information for as long as it is necessary for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.

When we have no ongoing legitimate business need to process your personal information, we will either delete or anonymize it. If deletion is not possible (for example, because your information is stored in backup archives), we will securely store your information and isolate it from further processing until deletion is possible.

You can request deletion of your data at any time through your account settings or by contacting us.

dataSecurity.title: How Do We Keep Your Information Safe?
dataSecurity.content: We have implemented appropriate technical and organizational security measures designed to protect your personal information. These measures include:
items: Encryption of data in transit using TLS/SSL
Encryption of data at rest
Regular security assessments and penetration testing
Access controls and authentication requirements
Secure data storage infrastructure
Employee training on data protection

limitations.title: Security Limitations
limitations.content: Despite our safeguards and efforts to secure your information, no electronic transmission over the Internet or information storage technology can be guaranteed to be 100% secure. We cannot promise or guarantee that hackers, cybercriminals, or other unauthorized parties will not be able to defeat our security and improperly collect, access, steal, or modify your information.

minors.title: Do We Collect Information from Minors?
minors.content:
We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 18 years of age. Our Services are not directed to individuals under the age of 18. If we learn that we have collected personal information from a child under 18, we will take steps to delete the information as soon as possible.

If you are a parent or guardian and believe we have collected information from your child, please contact us at info@aidorag.ai.

yourRights.title: What Are Your Privacy Rights?
yourRights.content: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information under applicable data protection laws. These rights may include:
items: Right to Access: Request access to and obtain a copy of your personal information
Right to Rectification: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal information
Right to Erasure: Request deletion of your personal information
Right to Restrict Processing: Request restriction of processing of your personal information
Right to Data Portability: Request transfer of your personal information to another service
Right to Object: Object to processing of your personal information
Right to Withdraw Consent: Withdraw consent where processing is based on consent

exercise.title: Exercising Your Rights
exercise.content: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at info@aidorag.ai or through your account settings. We will respond to your request in accordance with applicable law.

doNotTrack.title: Controls for Do-Not-Track Features
doNotTrack.content:
Most web browsers and some mobile operating systems include a Do-Not-Track ("DNT") feature or setting you can activate to signal your privacy preference not to have data about your online browsing activities monitored and collected.

At this stage, no uniform technology standard for recognizing and implementing DNT signals has been finalized. As such, we do not currently respond to DNT browser signals or any other mechanism that automatically communicates your choice not to be tracked online. If a standard for online tracking is adopted that we must follow in the future, we will inform you about that practice in a revised version of this Privacy Policy.

googleWorkspace.title: Google Workspace APIs
googleWorkspace.content:
If you connect your Google Workspace account to our Services, we will access and process data from your Google Workspace in accordance with Google's API Services User Data Policy.

Our use of information received from Google APIs will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements. Specifically:
items: We only access the data necessary to provide and improve our Services
We do not use Google Workspace data for advertising purposes
We do not sell Google Workspace data to third parties
We do not use Google Workspace data to build user profiles for advertising
Data access is limited to features explicitly requested by users

usResidents.title: Privacy Information for US Residents
usResidents.content:
If you are a resident of California, Colorado, Connecticut, Delaware, Florida, Indiana, Iowa, Montana, New Hampshire, New Jersey, Oregon, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, or Virginia, you have specific privacy rights under applicable state laws.

These rights may include:
items: Right to know what personal information is being collected
Right to know whether personal information is sold or disclosed and to whom
Right to say no to the sale or sharing of personal information
Right to access, correct, and delete personal information
Right to non-discrimination for exercising privacy rights

california.title: California Residents
california.content: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) as amended by the California Privacy Rights Act (CPRA), California residents have additional rights including the right to limit the use of sensitive personal information and the right to opt out of automated decision-making.

hipaa.title: HIPAA Compliance
hipaa.content:
AIDORag may process Protected Health Information (PHI) on behalf of certain customers who are HIPAA-covered entities or their business associates. In such cases, our handling of PHI is governed by a Business Associate Agreement (BAA) with the applicable customer.

If you are a healthcare provider or other HIPAA-covered entity interested in using our Services, please contact us at info@aidorag.ai to discuss our HIPAA compliance program and execute a BAA.

euUkResidents.title: Privacy Information for EU/UK Residents
euUkResidents.content:
If you are located in the European Union, European Economic Area, United Kingdom, or Switzerland, you have certain rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and UK GDPR.

Legal Bases for Processing: We process your personal information based on the following legal bases:
items: Performance of Contract: When processing is necessary to provide our Services to you
Legitimate Interests: For our legitimate business interests, such as fraud prevention and security
Consent: Where you have provided consent for specific processing activities
Legal Obligation: When we are required to process your data by law

transfers.title: International Transfers
transfers.content: Your information may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your country of residence. When we transfer personal information outside the EU/UK, we ensure appropriate safeguards are in place, such as Standard Contractual Clauses approved by the European Commission.

dpo.title: Data Protection Officer
dpo.content: If you have questions or concerns about our data practices, you may contact us at info@aidorag.ai. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with your local data protection authority.

updates.title: Do We Make Updates to This Policy?
updates.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. The updated version will be indicated by an updated "Last updated" date at the top of this page.

We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information. Your continued use of our Services after any changes indicates your acceptance of the updated Privacy Policy.

If we make material changes to this Privacy Policy, we may notify you by email or through a prominent notice on our Services prior to the change becoming effective.

contactUs.title: How Can You Contact Us About This Policy?
contactUs.content:
If you have questions or comments about this Privacy Policy, or if you would like to exercise your privacy rights, you can contact us:

By email: info@aidorag.ai

By mail:
AIDORag, Inc.
9011 Mira Mesa BLVD # 246
San Diego, CA 92126
United States

reviewData.title: How Can You Review, Update, or Delete Your Data?
reviewData.content:
Based on applicable laws in your country or state of residence, you may have the right to request access to, correction of, or deletion of the personal information we collect from you.

To request to review, update, or delete your personal information, you can:

• Access your account settings to update your profile information
• Submit a request through our support portal
• Contact us at info@aidorag.ai

We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable law.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using AIDORag, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

description.title: Description of Service
description.content: AIDORag is an AI-powered document intelligence platform that allows you to upload documents, ask questions, and receive answers with source citations. Our service includes document processing, knowledge graph generation, and AI-powered search capabilities.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content: To use certain features of our service, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
items: Maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials
All activities that occur under your account
Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized use

acceptableUse.title: Acceptable Use
acceptableUse.content: You agree not to use our service to:
items: Upload illegal, harmful, or offensive content
Violate any applicable laws or regulations
Infringe on intellectual property rights
Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Interfere with or disrupt the service

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: You retain ownership of all documents you upload. By using our service, you grant us a limited license to process your documents solely for the purpose of providing our services. We do not use your documents to train our AI models without explicit consent.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Paid features are billed in advance on a monthly or annual basis. Refunds are available within 14 days of initial purchase for annual plans. We reserve the right to change our pricing with 30 days notice.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, AIDORag shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages resulting from your use of or inability to use the service.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate or suspend your account at any time for violation of these terms. Upon termination, your right to use the service will immediately cease. You may export your data before account closure.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will notify users of significant changes via email or through the service. Continued use of the service after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at info@aidorag.ai.

whatAre.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAre.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences and understanding how you use our service.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.intro: We use different types of cookies for various purposes:

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for the website to function properly. These cookies enable core functionality such as security, authentication, and session management.

preference.title: Preference Cookies
preference.description: Allow us to remember your preferences such as language, theme, and display settings to provide a personalized experience.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information about page visits and user behavior.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements. We do not sell your data to third parties.

managing.title: Managing Cookies
managing.content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to:
items: View and delete existing cookies
Block all cookies or only third-party cookies
Set preferences for specific websites
managing.note: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our service.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.content: Some of our pages may contain content from third-party services that set their own cookies. These include:
items: Google Analytics for usage statistics
Stripe for payment processing
Intercom for customer support

updates.title: Updates to This Policy
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at info@aidorag.ai.

status.title: System Status
status.subtitle: Real-time status of all AIDORag services

apiLatency.title: Increased API Latency
apiLatency.description: Some users experienced slower response times on API endpoints. Issue was identified and resolved within 30 minutes.

docDelays.title: Document Processing Delays
docDelays.description: Large document uploads were experiencing processing delays due to high traffic. Additional capacity was added to resolve the issue.

subscribe.title: Stay Updated
subscribe.subtitle: Subscribe to receive real-time notifications about system status and maintenance.

press.subtitle: News, resources, and media information about AIDORag

contact.title: Media Contact
contact.description: For press inquiries, interviews, and media requests

launch.title: AIDORag Launches Revolutionary Document Intelligence Platform
launch.excerpt: AIDORag announces the launch of its AI-powered document intelligence platform, featuring advanced RAG technology and knowledge graph capabilities.

funding.title: AIDORag Secures Seed Funding to Accelerate Growth
funding.excerpt: AIDORag raises seed funding to expand its team and accelerate product development for enterprise customers.

enterprise.title: AIDORag Introduces Enterprise Plan with Advanced Security
enterprise.excerpt: New enterprise offering includes SOC2 compliance, SSO integration, and dedicated support for large organizations.

videos.title: Video Showcase
videos.subtitle: Watch our product demos, startup pitch, and event highlights

demo.title: Product Demo
demo.description: See AIDORag in action with a full walkthrough of our AI-powered document intelligence platform.

pitch.title: Startup Pitch
pitch.description: Our founding story and vision for the future of enterprise document management.

event.title: Tech Conference 2025
event.description: Highlights from our keynote presentation at the annual AI & Enterprise Tech Summit.

cta.title: Need More Information?
cta.subtitle: Contact our press team for additional resources and interview requests

gdpr.title: Compliance
gdpr.subtitle: How AIDORag protects your data under the General Data Protection Regulation

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Data Protection
commitment.description: AIDORag is committed to protecting your personal data and respecting your privacy rights under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). We process your data lawfully, fairly, and transparently.

access.title: Right to Access
access.description: You can request a copy of all personal data we hold about you at any time.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You can request correction of any inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: You can request deletion of your personal data under certain circumstances.

restriction.title: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: You can request that we limit the processing of your personal data.

portability.title: Right to Portability
portability.description: You can request your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

objection.title: Right to Object
objection.description: You can object to processing of your personal data for certain purposes.

lawfulness.title: Lawfulness, Fairness & Transparency
lawfulness.description: We process data lawfully, fairly, and in a transparent manner.

limitation.title: Purpose Limitation
limitation.description: We collect data for specified, explicit, and legitimate purposes only.

minimization.title: Data Minimization
minimization.description: We only collect data that is adequate, relevant, and limited to what is necessary.

accuracy.title: Accuracy
accuracy.description: We keep personal data accurate and up to date.

storage.title: Storage Limitation
storage.description: We retain data only for as long as necessary for the intended purpose.

security.title: Integrity & Confidentiality
security.description: We ensure appropriate security of personal data through technical measures.

transfer.title: International Data Transfers
transfer.description: When we transfer your data outside the EEA, we ensure adequate protection through:

items.adequacy: Adequacy decisions by the European Commission

contact.title: Data Protection Officer
contact.description: For any GDPR-related inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Your data security is our top priority. Learn about our comprehensive security measures.

trust.title: Your Trust is Our Priority
trust.description: AIDORag implements industry-leading security measures to protect your data. We are committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection and privacy with enterprise-grade security at every layer.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted at rest using AES-256 and in transit using TLS 1.3.

authentication.title: Multi-Factor Authentication
authentication.description: Secure your account with MFA using authenticator apps or hardware keys.

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with 99.99% uptime SLA.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection across all systems.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Role-based access control (RBAC) with granular permissions management.

compliance.title: Compliance Standards
compliance.description: SOC2 Type II certified with regular third-party security audits.

atRest.title: Encryption at Rest
atRest.description: All stored data is encrypted using AES-256 encryption with secure key management.

inTransit.title: Encryption in Transit
inTransit.description: All data transfers use TLS 1.3 to ensure secure communication between systems.

backup.title: Secure Backups
backup.description: Automated encrypted backups with point-in-time recovery and geo-redundancy.

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability Disclosure
vulnerability.description: We take security vulnerabilities seriously. If you discover a security issue, please report it responsibly to our security team.

cta.title: Have Security Questions?
cta.subtitle: Our security team is available to answer your questions and provide additional documentation.

tutorials.subtitle: Step-by-step tutorials to help you get the most out of AIDORag

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with AIDORag
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to set up your account and upload your first document.

queryModes.title: Understanding Query Modes
queryModes.description: Deep dive into the 5 query modes: Naive, Local, Global, Hybrid, and Mix.

knowledgeGraph.title: Building Knowledge Graphs
knowledgeGraph.description: Learn how to use the knowledge graph feature to visualize entity relationships.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration Guide
apiIntegration.description: Integrate AIDORag into your applications using our REST API.

optimization.title: Optimization Tips
optimization.description: Best practices for optimizing document processing and query performance.

slackSetup.title: Slack Integration Setup
slackSetup.description: Connect AIDORag with Slack for seamless team collaboration.

needHelp.title: Need More Help?
needHelp.subtitle: Can't find what you're looking for? Check our documentation or join our community.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with AIDORag
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to set up your account and upload your first document in just a few minutes.

step1.title: Create Your Account
step1.content: Sign up for a free AIDORag account to get started. You'll have instant access to all basic features.
items: Visit the signup page
Enter your email and password
Verify your email address

step2.title: Explore the Dashboard
step2.content: Once logged in, you'll see your dashboard with three main sections:

step3.title: Upload Your First Document
step3.content: Click the upload button to add your first document. We support PDF, DOCX, TXT, and many more formats. Your document will be automatically processed and indexed for searching.

queryModes.title: Understanding Query Modes
queryModes.description: Learn about the 5 different query modes in AIDORag and when to use each one.

intro.title: What Are Query Modes?
intro.content: AIDORag offers 5 different query modes, each optimized for different types of questions and use cases. Choosing the right mode can significantly improve your results.

naive.title: Naive Mode
naive.description: Simple keyword-based search that quickly finds exact matches in your documents.
naive.bestFor: Finding specific terms, names, or exact phrases

local.title: Local Mode
local.description: Searches within specific document sections for detailed, context-aware answers.

global.title: Global Mode
global.description: Searches across your entire knowledge base to find comprehensive answers.
global.bestFor: Broad questions that span multiple documents

hybrid.title: Hybrid Mode
hybrid.description: Combines keyword and semantic search for the best of both worlds.

mix.title: Mix Mode
mix.description: Intelligently combines all modes to provide the most relevant results.
mix.bestFor: Complex queries that need multiple perspectives

tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.content: Start with Hybrid mode for most queries. Use Naive for exact matches, Global for broad research, and Mix when you need comprehensive results from multiple angles.

knowledgeGraph.title: Building Knowledge Graphs
knowledgeGraph.description: Learn how to use the knowledge graph feature to visualize and explore entity relationships in your documents.

intro.title: What is a Knowledge Graph?
intro.content: A knowledge graph automatically extracts entities (people, organizations, concepts) and their relationships from your documents, creating a visual map of your knowledge base.

entityDetection.title: Entity Detection
entityDetection.description: AI automatically identifies and categorizes entities like people, organizations, locations, and concepts.

relationMapping.title: Relationship Mapping
relationMapping.description: Discovers connections between entities across all your documents.

visualization.title: Visual Exploration
visualization.description: Interactive graph interface to explore your knowledge base visually.

graphQuery.title: Graph Queries
graphQuery.description: Ask complex questions about relationships and connections in your data.

howToUse.title: How to Use
howToUse.content: Navigate to the Explorer page from your dashboard. Upload documents and wait for processing. The knowledge graph will be automatically generated and you can click on nodes to explore relationships.

apiIntegration.title: API Integration Guide
apiIntegration.description: Learn how to integrate AIDORag into your applications using our comprehensive REST API.

setup.title: Get Your API Key
setup.content: Navigate to Settings > API Keys in your dashboard. Click 'Create New Key' and give it a descriptive name. Copy the key and store it securely.

authenticate.title: Authenticate Requests
authenticate.content: Include your API key in the Authorization header of every request: 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY'

query.title: Make Your First Query
query.content: Use the /api/query endpoint to search your documents. Specify the query mode, limit, and your question in the request body.

handle.title: Handle Responses
handle.content: Parse the JSON response to get your results. Each result includes the answer, source citations, and confidence scores.

features.restDesc: Standard REST endpoints for all operations
features.authDesc: API key authentication with rate limiting

optimization.title: Optimization Tips
optimization.description: Best practices for optimizing document processing and query performance in AIDORag.

intro.title: Why Optimize?
intro.content: Proper optimization can significantly improve query accuracy, reduce response times, and help you get the most out of your AIDORag subscription.

chunking.title: Document Chunking
chunking.description: How you prepare and upload documents affects search quality.
items: Split large documents into logical sections
Use consistent formatting across documents
Include clear headings and structure

indexing.title: Indexing Strategy
indexing.description: Organize your documents for better retrieval.
items: Group related documents in collections
Use descriptive file names
Add metadata tags when uploading

querying.title: Query Optimization
querying.description: Write better queries for more accurate results.
items: Be specific in your questions
Use the right query mode for your use case
Include context when asking follow-up questions

caching.title: Caching & Performance
items: Reuse chat sessions for related questions
Use streaming for long responses
Batch similar queries together

bestPractices.title: Best Practices Summary
bestPractices.content: Keep documents well-structured, choose appropriate query modes, and leverage caching for frequently asked questions. Monitor your usage analytics to identify optimization opportunities.

slackSetup.title: Slack Integration Setup
slackSetup.description: Connect AIDORag with Slack to query your documents directly from your team channels.

intro.title: Why Slack Integration?
intro.content: With Slack integration, your team can query AIDORag directly from any Slack channel, making knowledge access instant and collaborative.

install.title: Install the App
install.content: Go to Settings > Integrations in your AIDORag dashboard and click 'Add to Slack'. Authorize the app in your Slack workspace.

authorize.title: Authorize Permissions
authorize.content: Review and approve the required permissions. AIDORag needs access to read messages in channels where it's invited and send responses.

configure.title: Configure Channels
configure.content: Choose which Slack channels AIDORag should be active in. You can also set up custom triggers and response formats.

test.title: Test the Integration
test.content: Invite @AIDORag to a channel and try a query like '@AIDORag what is our refund policy?' to test the integration.

features.channelsDesc: Works in any public or private channel

tips.title: Tips for Best Results
items: Start your query with @AIDORag mention
Be specific in your questions for better accuracy
Use thread replies for follow-up questions

pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include a 14-day free trial.
pricing.bottomNote: All plans include SSL encryption, 99.9% uptime SLA, and GDPR compliance.

testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers say about transforming their document workflows

items.quote: AIDORag transformed how we handle our legal documents. The knowledge graph feature is a game-changer for finding connections we never knew existed.
items.author: Sarah Chen

items.quote: We've reduced our research time by 80% since implementing AIDORag. The citation accuracy is remarkable - exactly what we needed for academic work.
items.author: Dr. Michael Roberts

items.quote: The multi-modal support is incredible. We can upload PDFs, presentations, and images all in one place. The AI understands context across all formats.
items.author: Emily Watson

items.quote: Best RAG solution we've tested. The 5 query modes give us flexibility that other tools simply don't have. Highly recommended for enterprise use.
items.author: James Liu

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about AIDORag

items.question: What file formats does AIDORag support?
items.answer: AIDORag supports a wide range of formats including PDF, DOCX, PPTX, XLSX, TXT, images (PNG, JPG, WebP), audio files (MP3, WAV), and video files (MP4). Our AI can extract and analyze content from all these formats.

items.question: How does the Knowledge Graph work?
items.answer: Our AI automatically extracts entities (people, organizations, concepts, locations) and their relationships from your documents. This creates a connected graph that helps you discover hidden connections and get more comprehensive answers to your questions.

items.question: What are the 5 Query Modes?
items.answer: The 5 query modes are: Naive (simple keyword search), Local (searches within specific documents), Global (searches across all documents), Hybrid (combines local and global), and Mix (our recommended mode that uses AI to choose the best approach for each query).

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade security including AES-256 encryption at rest, TLS 1.3 for data in transit, SOC2 Type II compliance, and GDPR compliance. Your data is never used to train our models, and you maintain full ownership.

items.question: Can I integrate AIDORag with my existing tools?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a comprehensive REST API, webhooks, and native integrations with popular tools like Slack, Microsoft Teams, Notion, and Google Workspace. Enterprise plans also include custom integration support.

items.question: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
items.answer: We'll notify you when you're approaching your limits. You can upgrade your plan at any time, or purchase additional capacity. We never delete your data if you exceed limits - you just won't be able to add new documents until you upgrade.

items.question: Do you offer a free trial?
items.answer: Yes! All paid plans include a 14-day free trial with full access to all features. No credit card required to start. You can also use our Free plan indefinitely with limited features.

items.question: How accurate are the citations?
items.answer: Our citation system provides exact page numbers and section references for every answer. We use advanced retrieval techniques to ensure citations are accurate and verifiable. Enterprise users report 99%+ citation accuracy.

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of teams who are already using AIDORag to unlock insights from their documents. Get started in minutes with our free tier.

footer.description: Transform your documents into intelligent, searchable knowledge with advanced RAG technology.

pricingPage.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include a 14-day free trial.
pricingPage.bottomNote: All plans include SSL encryption, 99.9% uptime SLA, and GDPR compliance.

enterprise.title: Enterprise
enterprise.description: Need more? Get custom pricing, dedicated infrastructure, on-premise deployment, and enterprise features.

items.question: Can I change plans later?
items.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) and PayPal. Enterprise customers can also pay via invoice.

items.question: Is there a free plan to try?
items.answer: Yes! We offer a Free plan that lets you try AIDORag with no commitment. You get 5 documents and 100 queries per month - perfect for testing if AIDORag fits your needs before upgrading to a paid plan.

items.question: What happens when I exceed my limits?
items.answer: You'll receive notifications as you approach your limits. You can upgrade anytime, or wait for the next billing cycle to reset your quota.

items.question: How do I get started?
items.answer: Simply sign up for our Free plan to start exploring AIDORag immediately. You can upload documents, test queries, and experience the power of RAG technology. When you're ready for more, upgrade to a paid plan for additional features.

modal.title: Choose Payment Method
modal.description: Select how you'd like to pay for
modal.secureNote: Secure payment processing. Your payment info is never stored on our servers.
